text:
Getting started with some MILP, haven't really been in this domain to date.
Suggestions? <https://jump.dev/|JuMP> seems like the obvious place to go, but any caveats, hidden gems out there?

<@U9VG1AYSG> I think I recently saw you mention something about doing some really successful Julia MILP.

text: I recommend JuMP, with the Cbc solver.
